persistentJobGUID.description: Persistent, globally-unique identifier for this job for use in constructing persistent model checkpoint keys. MUST be compatible with S3 key-naming rules, but MUST NOT contain forward slashes.

permutationsPyContents.description: JSON encoded string with contents of permutations.py file

descriptionPyContents.description: JSON encoded string with contents of permutations.py file

description.description: JSON description of search. For information about these parameters, refer to nupic.frameworks.opf.expGenerator.experimentDescriptionSchema.json

createCheckpoints.description: True to create checkpoints of best models.

predictionCacheMaxRecords.description: Maximum number of records in Prediction Output Cache. If this is not specified, system will default to use the value in configuration property, nupic.cluster.database.predictioncache.defaultMaxRecords, specified in the Nupic configuration file, npic-default.xml

useLPF.description: [deprecated] True if LPF (batch framework) is being used

useTerminators.description: Enable/Disable the following optimizations: 1) Model early termination 2) Model maturity 3) Swarm early termination

deterministicMode.description: Enable/Disable deterministic mode. In deterministic mode, Hypersearch will return the exact same result after every run, at the expense of speed  NOTE: This only applies to HSv1

dummyModel.description: A dict of parameters for a dummy model. If this key is absent, a real model is trained. See ModelRunner.py/OPFDummyModelRunner for the schema of the dummy parameters

speculativeParticles.description: If true (not 0), hypersearch workers will go ahead and create and run particles in subsequent sprints before the current sprint has been completed. If false, a worker will wait in a sleep loop until the current generation or sprint has finished before choosing the next particle position or going into the next sprint. When true, the best model can be found faster, but results are less repeatable due to the randomness of when each worker completes each particle.

webhook.description: Optional URL to be called when there are changes to the job status.
